ygData.subject: RE: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, i did not think of that, but either way they fixed that a long time ago.  even consented, you can not loot no drop items. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, i did not think of that, but either way they fixed that a long time
ago. even consented, you can not loot no drop items.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 5:40 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Yellow?!?
>
>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> > this has to be ONLY on rallos zek and maybe the new racewar
> server. on
> > nonPVP servers there is NO looting after a duel, nor in
> arena and PvP
> areas.
>
> Not if you /consent, which I think was the whole point.
>
> Tszaaz
